citation: Local Government (Copping Refuse Disposal Site Joint Authority) Order 2010 (Tas)
text:
Local Government (Copping Refuse Disposal Site Joint Authority) Order 2010

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following order under section 39B of the Local Government Act 1993 .

17 December 2010

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

BRYAN GREEN

Minister for Local Government

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Local Government (Copping Refuse Disposal Site Joint Authority) Order 2010 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Declaration of applicable authority
    The Copping Refuse Disposal Site Joint Authority is declared to be an authority to which Part 3A of the Local Government Act 1993 applies.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 29 December 2010

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
